tutorialContent.intro: Welcome to Codex! This guide will walk you through the core features to help you get the most out of your knowledge exploration.

sections.title: Starting Your Journey
sections.p1: There are multiple ways to begin exploring:

list.label: Direct Search
list.text1: Type any topic you're curious about into the main search bar.

list.label: Starter Topics
list.text1: Choose one of the curated topics on the welcome screen for instant inspiration.

list.label: Cosmic Leap
list.text1: Click the Cosmic Leap button to be taken to a random, serendipitous topic.

sections.title: Engaging with an Article
sections.p1: Once an article is generated, you have several tools at your disposal:

list.label: Text Interaction
list.text1: Highlight any word or phrase to bring up a quick menu. You can use
list.text2: The AI will provide a concise answer in a pop-up modal.

list.label: Image Generation
list.text1: Each section has a prompt for a descriptive image. Click 'Generate Image' to have the AI create a visual representation.

list.label: AI Image Editing
list.text1: Hover over any generated image and click the 'edit' icon. You can then provide a text prompt to modify the image, like 'change the season to winter' or 'add a cat'.

list.label: Quick Summaries
list.text1: Use the summary buttons (TL;DR, ELI5, etc.) below the introduction to get different perspectives on the content.

list.label: Timeline
list.text1: For historical topics, a timeline of key events provides a chronological overview. You can click on events to learn more.

sections.title: Conversing with Athena
sections.p1: The panel on the right is your AI Copilot, Athena. She has full context of the article you're reading.

list.label: Ask Anything
list.text1: Ask for clarification, deeper insights, or how concepts relate to each other.

list.label: Suggested Questions
list.text1: Use the suggestion chips to ask thoughtful questions curated by the AI.

sections.title: Connecting Knowledge
sections.p1: Codex is designed to help you discover connections between topics.

list.label: Synapse Graph
list.text1: At the bottom of each article, this graph shows you related topics. Click any node to generate a new article and continue your journey.

list.label: In-Article Links
list.text1: Clicking on events in the timeline will also start a search for that new topic.

list.label: Cosmic Leap
list.text1: Use this feature from the Synapse Graph to jump to a tangentially related but interesting new subject.

sections.title: Managing Your Data
sections.p1: Codex saves all your data in your browser. Access and manage it using the icons in the top-right header:

list.label: Bookmarks
list.text1: Save your favorite or most important articles for easy access.

list.label: Learning Paths
list.text1: Group related articles together to form a custom curriculum on a subject.

list.label: Snapshots
list.text1: Save an entire session—including the article, chat history, and related topics—to restore later.

glossaryContent.intro: This glossary explains the key terms and concepts within the Codex application.

terms.name: Athena AI Copilot
terms.description: The contextual chat assistant available for each article. It helps you delve deeper into the subject matter by answering questions.

terms.name: Synapse Graph
terms.description: An interactive, node-based visualization that displays topics related to the current article, encouraging exploration.

terms.name: Cosmic Leap
terms.description: A feature that suggests a serendipitous, tangentially related topic, designed to broaden your horizons in unexpected ways.

terms.name: AI Image Editing
terms.description: The ability to modify a generated image by providing a text-based prompt. This allows for fine-tuning visuals directly within an article.

terms.name: Learning Path
terms.description: A user-curated collection of articles. You can create paths to group topics together for focused learning.

terms.name: Session Snapshot
terms.description: A complete save-state of your current session, including the main article, chat history with Athena, and the Synapse Graph topics. Snapshots can be restored at any time.

entry.title: Welcome to Codex
entry.subtitle: Your personal knowledge engine. Discover, understand, and connect ideas like never before.

step1.title: 1. Search & Discover
step1.description: Start with a topic in the search bar, pick a suggestion, or take a leap of faith with 'Cosmic Leap'.

step2.title: 2. Interact & Understand
step2.description: Highlight any text for definitions, explanations, or AI images. Use summaries to quickly grasp complex topics.

step3.title: 3. AI Copilot 'Athena'
step3.description: Ask Athena questions about the article in the right-hand panel. She has the context and helps you dig deeper.

step4.title: 4. Connect Knowledge
step4.description: The 'Synapse Graph' at the end of each article shows you related topics. Click a node to continue your journey.
